subject: Arlington Million (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: The favorite Gio Ponti overcame a stumble at the start, took the lead on the final turn and won the 27th running of the Arlington Million in Arlington Heights, Ill.
snippet: The favorite Gio Ponti overcame a stumble at the start, took the lead on the final turn and won the 27th running of the Arlington Million in Arlington Heights, Ill.
